General.Name: Info Yatirim AS
General.Description: Info Yatirim Menkul Degerler A.S. operates in the field of capital market in Turkey. The company provides investment consultancy, portfolio management, and corporate finance services to individual and institutional investors; and brokerage services in the equity market, debt securities market, and futures and options market, as well as engages in the buying and selling of capital market instruments. It also offers share and VIOP, forex trading, and leveraged trading transaction services. The company was incorporated in 1990 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.
General.Address: Mecidiyeköy Yolu Caddesi V Plaza No: 14, Istanbul, Turkey, 34387
